summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3867 for the improvement of East 59th Street, from Latona Avenue to 10th Avenue Northeast, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 47293, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
